post.title: Will you be our Valentine? - CSGORoll Event
post.excerpt: Whether you've got a date or not this Valentine's Day, we'll see you from the 13th of February for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! We could never let Valentine's Day pass without showing you how much we really do appreciate you! So from the 13th -
post.content_html:
Whether you've got a date or not this Valentine's Day, we'll see you from the 13th of February for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

We could never let Valentine's Day pass without showing you how much we really do appreciate you! So from the 13th - 14th February, we've prepared two days full of special treats, exclusively for you. Starting this Sunday at 6pm UTC, you can expect the following;

Double Ruby Drops

For a limited time this Valentine's, Gems become Rubies â€“ and we'll be dropping twice as many as usual via our chat drops and the games available at CSGORoll! Your Rubies can then be spent on our limited-edition cases.

Start collecting Rubies now

Open Our Valentine's Cases

In the spirit of the season, your Rubies can be used to open our special-edition Valentine's cases, prepared with love.

Spend your hard earned Rubies on our Valentine's Cases

Join Us Live

It wouldn't be a special event without a special livestream! On Sunday 13th February, starting at 6pm UTC, join us on Twitch for extra special giveaways and in-game challenges. Make sure you dress nice for the occasion!

You can join here; https://www.csgoroll.com/en/stream

Call it a date this Valentine's. We'll be waiting.
